sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2013; while India and Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2013; while India and Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
